item

Class ItemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • item.ItemController

  • public class ItemController
extends java.lang.Object

    Menu Item Controller

    This controller class makes use of Item Entity class to do simple CRUD operations.
    Since:
    2018-04-12
    Version:
    1.0
